title: Raymond Carr on Labyrinth
itunes:title: Raymond Carr on Labyrinth
description:
You've all been asking for film crew members on the show, so this week Chuck asked his friend Raymond Carr to join him in the studio. Raymond is a very talented production designer and art director for TV and film, but his real talents are in the world of puppetry, where he most recently fulfilled a lifelong dream working for The Henson Company. It should be no surprise that Ray's movie crush is the 1986 fantasy adventure film, Labyrinth. Listen in and learn about the fascinating world of puppetry!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
